pageContext.claim: “Absentee ballots, by the way, are fine. But the universal mail-ins that are just sent all over the place, where people can grab them and grab stacks of them, and sign them and do whatever you want, that's the thing we're against.”
pageContext.analysis: Absentee ballots and mail-in ballots are the same. Each state has its own rules governing how they are managed.
